website_summaries.verdict: The attractive, fairly priced Samsung Chromebox desktop turns Google's Web-based Chrome OS into a not entirely unreasonable option for certain low-cost PC shoppers.
pros: The Samsung Chromebox offers an attractive, low-risk entry point to the experimental world of Google's Chrome OS
cons: Absent features and occasional software and hardware incompatibilities mar a supposedly simple user experience

customer_reviews.title: Super great product
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome! I received mine today after ordering it yesterday. I had it up and running in 5 minutes. It blows away any Microsoft product, including the Windows 8 disaster. I will be using this everyday and putting aside my desktop. So far I can do just about everything on this that I can do on my desktop without needing anti-virus software. I would recommend this to anyone frustrated with Microsoft. The really big plus is that operating system upgrades are automatically done without charge. Goodbye Microsoft!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron T. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard / TrackPad Works Well With This
customer_reviews.text: I have hooked up this Chromebox to my HDTV system and it works quite well. I purchased the DisplayPort to HDMI cable and the video is great in all it's 1080P goodness. I had to use the analog jack on the front of the box to hook it up to my Denon receiver since the DisplayPort does not pass along audio but the sound is quite good. I wish the analog audio jack was on the back of the unit but that's a small quibble. I purchased the Logitech K400 wireless keyboard / trackpad for this unit and it works flawlessly. The Logitech K400 is not a bluetooth unit. Very nice Chrome computer. Works very well as a HTPC.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Buy a newer box, many hassles for someone that isn't computer savvy.
customer_reviews.text: After a big hassle with having to manually update this box, everything worked fine. It was too old to update from Google and had to jump through hoops to get it working. I called Samsung support and they had not even heard of this box, and told me to call Google for the issue. I called Google and their first level support, even though very nice and helpful, was at a loss. after a few hours of Googling the issue myself I did actually find a fix. My recommendation is to buy a newer model if you plan on giving this as a gift to someone that isn't computer savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonrdrz

customer_reviews.title: LOVING IT....
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I decided this was the next step for me. I've only been using the Chromebox for a few days and I am easily adapting to an all web based experience. I'm loving the flexibility and was easy to link to my phone. Next purchase will be the Samsung Galaxy tablet. This may not be for everyone, but for me... it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: W Louviere

customer_reviews.title: more than happy!
customer_reviews.text: my little chromebox has very good so far. its quiet, fast, does everything that I need it to and does it well. software updates always bring noticeable improvements, and I see myself buying another chrome device in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worry free computer for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying Chromebox for a while and also own a Chromebook. They are great, boots instantly. No worries for Virus. For my office work, I use Google documents (they are free and I do not miss MS Office anymore!!!). Everything is saved at Google Drive so I do not back up anything anymore. The best part is that my daughter loves the Chromebook and she uses for her home assignments and study.
customer_reviews.author: Tapas K. Mal

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Almost instant boot up. Supports many users. Frequent updates and new features. It has now replaced my PC... Turn this on more than my PC, perfect for Internet surfing etc. Totally synced with Google, so convenient. Unless you would need 3rd party programs...
customer_reviews.author: Chester Chen

customer_reviews.title: great computer
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, easy to use computer. Basically turns your TV into a smartphone. I don't know why Samsung didn't promote these better and keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: noltervetter

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: If you live in the cloud you will love it. I bought this one for visitors to use so I don't have to share my laptop. Limited only by ability of the Chrome browser. I was surprised how well video works.
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Series 3 ChromeBox a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used the device for some time and it is both reliable and extremely easy to use. Setup was a breeze and speed is excellent. This is a great solution for the kids or those are not technically savvy. To be fair, you cannot directly print (solved by cloud print) and you dont have true dual monitor support yet but those are minor issues which will get solved as ChromeOS evolves.
customer_reviews.author: shardservant

customer_reviews.title: It's like having a smart phone on steroids.
customer_reviews.text: Fast login. Fast browsing. I was already using the Chrome operating system. On the downside: Google not very good at responding to real or perceived problems. I had a lot of pictures, documents, music etc. on my Dell that I couldn't transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Pete Hoover Jr

customer_reviews.title: great experience
customer_reviews.text: - shipment arrived on time - setup as easy as pie - automatic updates, as promised - easy to "switch" to newest level of OS/Browser - straightforward setup - power plug, montior plug, mouse, keyboard - ready to browse replaced my Mac Mini with this - happily living in the cloud now
customer_reviews.author: Juergen Allgayer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to connect to my 47" LG TV. I read somewhere that chromebox only supports up to 32" displays. But I had no trouble or resolution issue connecting to my 47". I use a FAVI SmartStick Wireless Keyboard to control this one. It boots up in less than 7 secs (almost same time for a smart TV to turn on and be ready).
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: This is my third Chrome box and possibly the best. The darn things just work from the gitgo
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Chrome box and possibly the best. The darn things just work from the gitgo, letting me do anything I could do with a much more expensive desktop computer. Thank you Google, and thank you Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this first generation Chromebox for use in a mosque. It has been working without any problems. Generally the users check email, write documents and prints. They mostly use the guest access to login and have no problems. It has been working for many months now with no noise, no over-heating or other technical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Chromebox
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need for being on line,period!!!! If you don't run programs for office work,etc. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome if you use and like google
customer_reviews.text: Finally windows look out more choices for operating systems. If you love your chrome web browser you will love chrome OS.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Vicari

customer_reviews.title: Great internet PC
customer_reviews.text: If you want an ultra simple, cheap desktop for Internet use, you'll like the Chromebox. It's probably the easiest computer ever to set up--I had mine unpacked and running in something like 2 minutes: plug in keyboard, mouse, and monitor, and turn it on. The only configuration you need is to enter the Wifi password of your home internet, and then you're done. I'm looking forward to not worrying about viruses, backups, manual software upgrades anymore :-) The box is quite snappy when browsing with Chrome, it's definitely not an underpowered low-end device.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. It's incredibly fast and convenient to use. There are, of course, things that you can't do on it that you can do on other desktops, like install programs. It's meant to be a cloud-based computer and it does a great job at that. I can't wait to see what else they have in store for it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Desktop Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I use the Chromebox as a desktop replacement and am very satisfied - Chrome and ChomeOS on an 24" screen are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Frank

customer_reviews.title: Early problems
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations for this product. I used DisplayPort to HDMI cable to connect it to a PC (Sony L), but the ChromeBox did not see it as 1080p and gave me a subset of a larger screen. Could not adjust any settings to make it right -- even ChromeBox reviews commented on this. Put ChromeBox aside and am not using it. I assumed Google would get things right but this is such a stupid error the ChromeBox is collecting dust now. I may try it again after the people at Google figure out they should have given the HDMI interface higher priority.
customer_reviews.author: HyperFlight

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Itdefinitely has some drawbacks like not being able to access Spotify. Butoverall it's good for my purposes, which are for recreational purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Resito

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the OS or how it connects to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the OS or how it connects to the TV and wireless keyboards and mice. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Hardware good - software ???
customer_reviews.text: The items works fine. But the software is sometimes not really good working - specially the office cloud nexus software. I hope it will be better in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.Lieb

customer_reviews.title: samsung chromebox
customer_reviews.text: real deal - this computer alternate is a crackerjack. does the job at breakneck speed and comes on faster than the best of the speed freaks.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hum problem
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews in all the positive things, everyone in my family loves the new Chromebox. But the hum noise from the speakers is really annoying. I bought a ground loop isolator and the noise reduced by 50% only, and I cant keep it on all the time because it goes automatically to sleep. Does anybody know if the hum problem can be solved in the future thru a software update or the problem is on the hardware so will never be fixed for my box?
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Limited
customer_reviews.text: This product is limited to what it can do. Perfect for the first user or the young teen that must have limited access to videos.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: "I hate it" is about right
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for non tech people...they hated it...I kept it and found I really really hate it. It does not work with many Google products,usb stuff and sometimes you need to be working offline...sucks for that moment. I tried to use in with a telcel stick in Mexico...no go. The little speaker sucks compared to a stinking kindle fire! I would take it out and shoot it but have decided not to waste a bullet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Mixed
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my chromebox and called Samsung fro help. They were supposed to call me back within 24 hrs. Three days later and no call. I had heard their customer service was poor. Now I have experienced it - I will never buy another Samsung product. The problem has since resolved and I like the utility of the Chrome device. That has more to do with Google than Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Northbrook

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but in all honesty I don't. I had to replace my desktop and thought I would give it a try. It is fine if ALL you do is surf the web....unless you want to use Spotify(not supported) or play games on Pogo(not supported) or surf websites with too many images(shockwave crash). It does not replace a desktop-there are just too many things it cannot do. I do like the size.
customer_reviews.author: Catnut

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Almost nothing works with. I'm a great fan of chrome and android and, moved by the "google" idea, got this one. Nothing works properly, maybe netflix and you tube. Forget flash videos from you pen drive... If you want to have a computer next to your TV don't buy this one, it works only for weather forecast and email (you can use a game console for this....) Completely disappointed. I'd like to have my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos F. Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Chromebox
customer_reviews.text: I saw too many good reviews on this product and feel that I should give it a try. I'm in the IT business for almost 20 years and wanted to test the Chromebox to see if this box could work for our IT environment. I can tell you this, Chromebox is not ready for prime time yet. There are too many functions that are either missing or incompatible. For anyone consider getting this box I would suggest spend few hundreds more and get the Apple mini or a cheap pc. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Juanlu

customer_reviews.title: Please pay the early adopter tax
customer_reviews.text: There are some things this does beautifully (fast startup) There are some things it does not (play audio which in my mind is vital to any online experience nowadays) That's the bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Need the accessories
customer_reviews.text: I was astonished to find that it didn't come with needed accessories -- wireless keyboard and wireless mouse. There was no prompt that this was extra.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand J. Reinke

product_meta.title: Samsung Series 5 Chromebox, Celeron B840, 4GB, 16GB SSD, XE300M22-A01US
product_meta.description:
The Series 5 Chromebox XE300M22-A01US Desktop Computer (Black) from Samsung is a fast, compact desktop computer designed for home and office environments. Small enough to be placed in a desk, in a bookshelf or even next to a couch, the built-in 802.11a/b/g/n Wi-Fi means you can place it in the furthest corners of your place without having to hassle with cables.
